name: Slash of the Slice
description:
CONTROLS: WASD to move. Left click to slash. Right click to afterimage.

Ray Yamato is a legendary samurai in the making. He is an expert at fooling enemies with his afterimage technique.

Yeah, the ghosts kinda' suck. I'd love to fix that. Please comment if you actually manage to beat this. Because I couldn't. Maybe I should have spent more time playtesting.

Made for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme of "it is not real".

My interpretation on the theme was based around the "afterimage" technique, where one creates a temporary "not real" version of themselves.
